theBrewmaster:Intoxication.NAME: Intoxication
DESCRIPTIONS: You have had a few drinks.
You are intoxicated.

theBrewmaster:DoubleFistPower.NAME: Double Fist
DESCRIPTIONS: Your next #yBrew card is played twice this turn.
Your next
#yBrew cards are played twice this turn.

theBrewmaster:FluidMotionPower.NAME: Fluid Motion
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you lose Intoxication, gain that much Block.

theBrewmaster:PocketFlaskPower.NAME: Pocket Flask
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain
Intoxication whenever you play a brew card.

theBrewmaster:AdmiralsBrewPower.NAME: Admiral's Brew
DESCRIPTIONS: Reducing unblocked damage by half. Taking
damage in
turns.

theBrewmaster:VasoimmolationPower.NAME: Vasoimmolation
DESCRIPTIONS: You and each enemy takes
Each enemy takes
% of you Intoxication as damage at the end of your turn.

theBrewmaster:ThickSkinPower.NAME: Thick Skin
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain Intoxication equal to your remaining block at the start of your turn.

theBrewmaster:TemperancePower.NAME: Temperance
DESCRIPTIONS: If you would gain Intoxication, gain a stack of Regen instead.

theBrewmaster:DionysianFormPower.NAME: Dionysian Form
DESCRIPTIONS: At the beggining of your turn, add a random Brew card into your hand. It costs 0.
At the beggining of your turn, add a random upgraded Brew card into your hand. It costs 0.

theBrewmaster:DrenchedPower.NAME: Drenched
DESCRIPTIONS: When damaged, all enemies take
damage.

theBrewmaster:EthanolVaporPower.NAME: Ethanol Vapor
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you gain Intoxication, apply
Drenched to a random enemy.
